Posts.Content: phylls wrote: I had a lumpectomy and radiation 2 years ago and now on my routine mammogram calcifications in the same area as the lumpectomy are seen.  I am having a stereotaxic biopsy in a few days.  I'm obviously very nervous.  Does anyone else have experience with this.
